title: Chilling Breath
data:
{{obsolete}}
{{flavour|Exhales a blast of frost that bypasses any armour the target may have, and may knock back airborne targets.}}

'''Chilling Breath''' is a [[monster]]-only [[breath]] which deals [[cold]] damage that partially ignores [[AC]], and knocks back [[flying]] targets in a way similar to the [[Force Lance]] spell.

The following enemies cast Chilling Breath:
*{{monsterlink|white draconian}} (3d18 damage)

The following enemies may be able to cast Chilling Breath, depending on their spell set:
*{{monsterlink|Tiamat}} (3d29 damage)

==History==
*In [[0.27]], this spell was replaced with [[Cold Breath]].

[[Category:Monster spells]]
